scripts.build: sass assets/scss/style.scss:assets/built/css/style.css --style=compressed && cp *.hbs dist/build && cp -r assets dist/build && cp package.json dist/build && cp -r partials dist/build && cp node_modules/katex/dist/katex.min.js assets/built/js && cp node_modules/katex/dist/contrib/*.min.js assets/built/js && cp -r node_modules/katex/dist/fonts/* assets/fonts/katex && cd dist/build && bestzip ../counterweight.zip * && rm -rf * && cd ../..
